description: An Advisory sent when a Stream abandons a batch
title: io.nats.jetstream.advisory.v1.stream_batch_abandoned

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

reason.description: The reason the batch was abandoned

stream.description: The name of the Stream that's acted on

batch.description: The ID of the batch that was abandoned
